markdown.vditorLoadFailed: Vditor failed to load (switched to plain text): {{error}}

footer.shortcuts: Press Ctrl+S to save â€¢ Esc to close

conflict.title: File changed on disk
conflict.message: This file was modified on disk since you opened it. Choose how to resolve the conflict before saving.
conflict.reloadWarning: Reloading may discard your local unsaved changes and load the disk version.
conflict.overwriteWarning: Overwriting will replace the disk version with your current edits.
conflict.autosaveSkippedBody: The file changed on disk. Autosave was stopped to avoid overwriting it. Use Save to resolve.
